feed.title: BIPable-idea: Consistent and better definition of the term 'address'

entry.title: BIPable-idea: Consistent and better definition of the term 'address'
entry.summary: The author has received positive feedback for their idea and has written a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP). The draft of the proposal is available on GitHub. A member of the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Marco Falke, expressed appreciation for the use of the term "bitcoin invoice address" as it is easily translatable into other languages. The email thread also includes an attachment for a pEpkey.asc file.
